## Basic Information

**Name**: Siyue Gao

**Hometown**: Beijing, China

**Fun Fact**: 1000+ hours reached in the World's Best game, the Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild

**More about me**:

I am a 2nd-year MPH Candidate in [Department of Environmental Health Sciences](https://www.publichealth.columbia.edu/academics/departments/environmental-health-sciences-ehs), with a Certificate in Applied Biostatistics and Public Health Data Science, at [Columbia University Mailman School of Public Health](https://www.publichealth.columbia.edu).

I am working as a data analyst with [Dr. Ana Navas-Acien](https://www.publichealth.columbia.edu/people/our-faculty/an2737) on metal exposure and early cardiovascular risk in adult e-cigarette users.

Please visit my [Experience page](experience.html) for more information.
